item.title: Trump's energy secretary nominee faces questions over climate posts and LA fires
item.description: Trump's pick for secretary of energy, fracking executive Chris Wright, faced questions about a past social media post calling wildfires "hype."

item.title: The Transportation Department sues Southwest Airlines for alleged oft-delayed flights
item.description: The agency is seeking civil penalties against Southwest Airlines, and also fined Frontier Airlines for its continuous delays.
